title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Kasu Mala Haaram with South Sea Pearls
features: This magnificent three-strand Haaram features intricately designed Kasu (coin) motifs alternating with delicate floral patterns. The necklace is set with brilliant-cut diamonds, complemented by vibrant round-cut rubies and emeralds. Dangles of lustrous South Sea pearls add a touch of elegance. The locket (approx. 1.49 grams diamond weight, 2.00 carats ruby weight, 1.35 carats emerald weight) is a grand floral motif studded with diamonds, ruby, and emerald. Features fine Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
occasions: and upscale cultural events. It can also be worn to make a statement at modern galas and formal gatherings.
description: A timeless heirloom piece showcasing exquisite South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, rubies, and South Sea pearls makes it a truly opulent and valuable possession. The traditional Kasu Mala design carries cultural significance and is believed to bring prosperity and good fortune. The high-quality materials and meticulous detailing ensure lasting beauty and durability.
